attributes.action: Instruct the nation how to seek a vote of no confidence in the current government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NuLabour have clearly lost touch with reality and need to be replaced as soon as is feasible, preferably while there is still some hope of resuscitating the United Kingdom as a viable entity. As Mr Brown has clearly failed us in every possible way, he owes it to the nation to assist us in achieving a vote of no confidence in his 'government'.

rejection.details: Petitions exist already calling for a general election.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
